title: INTERVIEW: Europe should be unapologetic about protecting its infrastructure
summary_full: MEP Markéta Gregorová, rapporteur for the Cybersecurity Act review, told Euractiv the bloc's lawmakers are slowly waking up to the risks of strategic dependencies
summary_public: MEP Markéta Gregorová, rapporteur for the Cybersecurity Act review, told Euractiv the bloc's lawmakers are slowly waking up to the risks of strategic dependencies
